import { Meta, Story, Props, Preview } from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';
import LinkPreview from '..';
import Highlight from '../../Highlight';

<Meta title="Components/LinkPreview" />

<Story name="Import" />

# LinkPreview

LinkPreview shows about an embedded link, e.g. a headline, image, summary from the link destination.

<Highlight><b>Note:</b> This component will not work for some or many websites due to the <b>CORS</b> policies.</Highlight>

## Import

```jsx
import { LinkPreview } from '@qnt/ui';
```

<Story name="Props" />

## Props

<Props of={LinkPreview} />

## Usage

### Default

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="Default">
    <>
      <LinkPreview url="https://blueprintjs.com" />
      <br />
      <LinkPreview url="http://www.test-domain.com" />
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### previewNotFoundText

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="previewNotFoundText">
    <>
      <LinkPreview url="http://www.test-domain.com" previewNotFoundText="Custom message" />
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>

### isFullWidth

<Preview withToolbar>
  <Story name="isFullWidth">
    <>
      <LinkPreview url="https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML" isFullWidth />
      <br />
      <LinkPreview url="http://www.test-domain.com" isFullWidth />
    </>
  </Story>
</Preview>
